item.title: The First Track
item.description: I recently published my first track, Dwarven Future, and I have an awful lot to say about it. Getting Into Music This has been a long time coming, and a journey that started almost 2 years ago. I began with a Yamaha Reface CS and later an Arturia Drum Brute Impact. Since then, I’ve slowly built up a collection of equipment to make music entirely on my own. Doing it Blind This was the single largest barrier to getting into music production.

Bean Themes Have you ever thought about what kind of theme song your character, pet, or fursona might have? Techno, EDM, synthwave, or some rock organ? Maybe you need a retro chiptune for your protogen, or nothing short of a lively tropical jam will do for your parrot. Perhaps there’s a suave fox who needs to get down to some heart-pounding EDM or prowl the neon streets of synthwave city. Either way, your character deserves a great tune to go with all of that exquisite artwork you have.

Everyone-Games Everyone-Games is a Team of Volunteersâ€¦ Promoting accessibility through online events, software solutions, games, social media activism, and working with game developers in the industry. General Info This year, Everyone-Games is partnering with two charities: Everyone Can and Stack Up Donation Campaign Guess what? I’m going to be there! I’ll be streaming Stardew Valley, showing how us blind folk play videogames, and raising money for both charities! Donate to Everyone Can on Tiltify Donate to Stack Up on Tiltify Schedule Everyone-Games schedule I’ll be participating in the panel on representation in gaming to speak on how gaming helps people in the LGBTQ+ community and what representation and inclusivity means.

Composition Terms of Service By commissioning PepperTheVixen (me, the composer), you (the client) agree to the following terms: 1. Ownership: A. The composer will retain copyright of all works created under commission, unless otherwise agreed in writing. If rights are transferred to the client, the composer will relinquish the copyright to the work once ownership has been transferred. B. The composer retains the right to exhibit the commissioned work in all mediums, unless otherwise agreed in writing.

Twitch Streams I’m on Twitch! Come watch me play games and make music! https://www.twitch.tv/pepperthevixen What do I stream? I stream games, music, and generally have a good time. I make jokes, say silly stuff, talk to viewers, yell at pixels, and just have fun! Any game I play will be accessible to blind players since I myself am blind! I’ll talk about how I play, and I’m happy to share info with other blind folk looking to get into (or back into) gaming.

item.title: Music - PepperTheVixen
item.description: Pull up your headphones and take a listen below to what I’ve got! When Neon Demons Win Dwarven Future
